content: this versatile crochet bag is perfect for a trip to your local farmers market worked back and forth in an all-over mesh design this easy chain stitch and single_crochet pattern works up quickly into a large rectangle that will expand generously to accommodate all your fresh finds with a little hook work cinching and adding straps the rectangle is transformed into a stylish market bag for your next shopping adventure in any lily sugar n cream color you ll love this fun seasonal project yarns for models lily® sugar n cream® 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m berry 01148 or blue 01146 or botanical green 01144 3 balls
